languages.text: "Дитя Рассвета, это была достойная жертва — Господин будет доволен. Сверши последний шаг, дабы навеки вплести свою нить в узор неизбежного грядущего".
"This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. The master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."
languages.original_text: "Дитя Рассвета, это была достойная жертва — Господин будет доволен. Сверши последний шаг, дабы навеки вплести свою нить в узор неизбежного грядущего".

traits.locale_text: "This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. Master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."
"This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. Master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."

"This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. The master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."

languages.text: “这是件有价值的祭品，黎明之子，主人一定会很满意。好了，是时候迈出最后一步了，将你的命运之线化为注定到来的未来。”
languages.original_text: "This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. The master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."

traits.locale_text: “这是件有价值的祭品，黎明之子，主人一定会很满意。好了，是时候迈出最后一步了，将你的命运之线化为注定到来的未来。”

languages.text: "Das war ein würdiges Opfer, Kind der Dämmerung. Meister wird erfreut sein. Nun macht den letzten Schritt und webt Euren Faden für immer in das Ornament der unausweichlichen Zukunft."
languages.original_text: "This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. The master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."

traits.locale_text: "Das war ein würdiges Opfer, Kind der Dämmerung. Meister wird erfreut sein. Nun macht den letzten Schritt und webt Euren Faden für immer in das Ornament der unausweichlichen Zukunft."

languages.text: «Ha sido un sacrificio digno, Vástago del Amanecer. El maestro estará complacido. Ahora da el último paso y urde los hilos de tu destino para formar el tapiz de un futuro ineludible».
languages.original_text: "This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. The master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido un sacrificio digno, Vástago del Amanecer. El maestro estará complacido. Ahora da el último paso y urde los hilos de tu destino para formar el tapiz de un futuro ineludible».

languages.text: « Un bien beau sacrifice, enfant de l'Aube. Voilà qui plaira au maître. À présent, allez jusqu'au bout et mêlez-vous à la trame de l'avenir inéluctable. »
languages.original_text: "This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. The master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."

traits.locale_text: « Un bien beau sacrifice, enfant de l'Aube. Voilà qui plaira au maître. À présent, allez jusqu'au bout et mêlez-vous à la trame de l'avenir inéluctable. »

languages.text: 「暁の子よ、これは立派な生贄だ。主もお喜びになるだろう。さあ、最後の一歩を踏み出し、逃れられぬ未来の装具へと永遠に糸を織り込んでいくのだ」
languages.original_text: "This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. The master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."

traits.locale_text: 「暁の子よ、これは立派な生贄だ。主もお喜びになるだろう。さあ、最後の一歩を踏み出し、逃れられぬ未来の装具へと永遠に糸を織り込んでいくのだ」

languages.text: "Bu değerli bir fedakârlık Şafak Evladı. Efendimiz memnun olacak. Şimdi son adımı atarak kaçınılmaz geleceğin kanaviçesine kendi ipliğini işle."
languages.original_text: "This was a worthy sacrifice, Child of the Dawn. The master will be pleased. Now take the final step and weave your thread forever into the ornament of the inescapable future."
